K

King - Class in engine.forPiece
The King class represents a king chess piece.
King(Alliance, int, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class engine.forPiece.King
Constructs a new King instance with the given alliance, piece position, and castling capabilities.
King(Alliance, int, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class engine.forPiece.King
Constructs a new King instance with the given alliance, piece position, first move status, castling status, and castling capabilities.
KING - Enum constant in enum class engine.forPiece.Piece.PieceType
Represents a king with a value of 100 pawns.
kingBonus(int, Board) - Method in enum class engine.Alliance
Calculates the bonus for a king at a given position on the board.
kingCastled(Player) - Method in class engine.forPlayer.forAI.MiddlegameBoardEvaluator
Calculates the score based on whether the players king has castled.
kingCastled(Player) - Method in class engine.forPlayer.forAI.OpeningBoardEvaluator
Calculates the score based on whether the players king has castled.
kingSafety(Player, Board) - Method in class engine.forPlayer.forAI.EndgameBoardEvaluator
Calculates the score based on the safety of the players king.
kingSafety(Player, Board) - Method in class engine.forPlayer.forAI.MiddlegameBoardEvaluator
Calculates the score based on the safety of the players king.
kingSafety(Player, Board) - Method in class engine.forPlayer.forAI.OpeningBoardEvaluator
Calculates the score based on the safety of the players king.
KingSafetyAnalyzer - Class in engine.forPlayer.forAI
The `KingSafetyAnalyzer` class is responsible for comprehensively analyzing the safety of the king during a chess game.
KingSafetyAnalyzer() - Constructor for class engine.forPlayer.forAI.KingSafetyAnalyzer
Private constructor to prevent instantiation of `KingSafetyAnalyzer`.
kingSideCastleCapable - Variable in class engine.forPiece.King
A boolean indicating if the king is capable of performing king-side castling.
KingSideCastleMove(Board, Piece, int, Rook, int, int) - Constructor for class engine.forBoard.Move.KingSideCastleMove
Constructs a `KingSideCastleMove` instance with the provided board, moving piece, destination coordinate, castle rook, and rook start and destination positions.
kingThreat(Move) - Static method in enum class engine.forBoard.BoardUtils
Checks if making a specific move puts the king in threat.
kingThreat(Player) - Method in class engine.forPlayer.forAI.MiddlegameBoardEvaluator
Evaluates the threat posed by a specific opponent piece to the player's king.
kingThreat(Player) - Method in class engine.forPlayer.forAI.OpeningBoardEvaluator
Evaluates the threat posed by a specific opponent piece to the player's king.

The Knight class represents a knight chess piece.
